title: Using u-substitution
speech: Starting by setting  u is equal to, x plus 2  then  d u is equal to d x .
pacedSpeech: Starting by setting   u is equal to, x plus 2
then   d u is equal to d x

title: Find the integral
speech: the integral of 1 over u, d u is equal to l n the absolute value of u plus   c
pacedSpeech: the integral of 1 over u, d u is equal to l n the absolute value of u plus   c

title: Back-subsitute
text: Plug $$x+2$$ back into u to obtain $$ln|x+2|+C$$
speech: Plug  x plus 2  back into u to obtain  l n, the absolute value of x plus 2, end absolute value plus   c
pacedSpeech: back into u to obtain   l n, the absolute value of x plus 2, end absolute value plus   c
